issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Only accessible cgroup mount directories should be selected for a controller

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Port YARN-6433 findControllerInMtab change from CGroupsHandlerImpl to CgroupsLCEResourcesHandler
fields.summary: Do not mount inaccessible cgroups directories in CgroupsLCEResourcesHandler

Thanks, [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com].  A tiny point, but could you add something in the test to make sure the temp dirs get deleted even if an exception is thrown, e.g. put the delete in a finally?

Thanks [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com] for the patch! A couple of nits:
1) Can we rename test (instance of CgroupsLCEResourcesHandler) to handler (or similar) instead? 
2) Let's be more specific about the assert error message. How about 'CPU mount point directory is not created successfully'? Similarly, for memory.
Thank you, [~templedf], [~haibochen], [~rkanter] for the review. I updated the patch addressing the concerns.
